economical.translation[0].definitions[0]: using money, time, goods etc carefully and without wasting any
A small car is more economical to run.
economical.translation[1].definitions[0]: using time, money, goods etc carefully and without wasting any
Adults generally watch a movie on video once or twice, making it more economical to rent than buy.
Environmentalists insist that polystyrene recycling can be economical.
